headline: Dave Ramsey Slams People Dreaming About The 1950s Ford Factory Worker Owning A Nice House, Says It Wasn't The Dream People Think It Was
summary: Personal finance expert Dave Ramsey has a message for people nostalgic about the “good old days” of American homeownership: you’re looking at the past through rose-colored glasses. That 1957 Dream Home Wasn’t What You Think In a recent episode of “The Ramsey Show,” Ramsey pushed back against a viral Instagram post that claimed a Ford Motor factory worker in the 1950s could afford a house, a car, and a stay-at-home wife on a single income. “I’m looking at the house. headline: Is General Motors (GM) Still At A Reasonable Price After Strong Three Year Share Gains?
summary: If you are looking at General Motors and wondering whether the current share price gives you good value, you are not alone. This article focuses squarely on what you might be paying for each dollar of the business. GM shares last closed at US$82.87, with returns of 2.3% over the past week, 2.4% over the past month, 2.3% year to date, 68.0% over the past year and 134.2% over three years, which raises questions about how much optimism is now reflected in the price. Recent headlines around GM...
